title: ZZX-MSP
blurb: Managed Service Platform for multi-tenant monitoring, backups, patching, access, billing, incidents, and runbooks â€” with zero-trust isolation.
description: ZZX-MSP centralizes operations for multiple client tenants. It brings observability (metrics/logs/traces), alert routing and on-call schedules, scheduled backups with integrity verification and restore drills, safe patch windows, zero-trust access with short-lived credentials, approval gates for production, and policy-as-code with full audit trails. Runbooks compose Ansible, Terraform, and CLI tasks with dry-run/change-set workflows. Ticketing/billing integrations complete the loop.

versions.notes: Runbook composer, policy generator, status page template.
Tenant model, basic dashboards, and integrations scaffold.
